Know About Us

About Us

Ananta Resource Management (Ananta Companies-Group /Company) is dedicated to helping you build your talent pool. Our team of professional recruiters is complimented by deep domain expertise capable of delivering services of the highest quality and offering end-to-end support.

Ananta Resource Manangement (ARM) has been founded by CA Mukesh Solanki, with a vision to help candidates find the job with their matching skills & talent as a backward integration we are providing Training to candidates with 3 yrs internship prgramme under the name PPTA (Programme for Practical Training of Accounts) where we provide 3 yrs of practical Training on Job compled with theoritical workshops.

SERVICES & PROCESS

Recruitment Services

Shortlisting Telephonic Interview (HR & Technical) & Scheduling Candidates as per your requirement

Manpower Services

Employees on our payroll, working at your office.

Temporary staffing

In pick time or on notice period of new joinee- employees for all skill set -per day/monthly.
